sentence: Representative Jim Jordan also believes the committee investigating the Capitol riot wants to keep Trump from running for the White House again.
author: Jenni Fink
title: Matt Gaetz Believes Jan. 6 Committee Will Try to Block Trump From 2024 Run

sentence: “I don’t know anything about what Madison referenced,” said Rep. Jim Jordan (R-OH), a leader of the right-most flank of the conference that includes Cawthorn.
author: Sam Brodey
title: Angry GOP Responds to Cawthorn’s ‘Bizarre’ D.C. Orgy Claims: ‘Name Names’

sentence: Representative Jim Jordan, one of the co-founders of the House Freedom Caucus and one of Donald Trump’s fiercest apologists in Congress, had nothing to say when The Independent asked about his remarks.
author: Eric Garcia
title: Madison Cawthorn’s comments angered House Republicans. He was already in trouble back home

sentence: Mr Meadows’ close friend, Rep. Jim Jordan of Ohio, suggested in a late text on 5 January 2021 that Vice President Mike Pence “should call out all electoral votes that he believes are unconstitutional as no electoral votes at all.” Mr Meadows texted back in the early hours of 6 January: “I have pushed for this.
author: Bevan Hurley
title: Trump’s chief of staff was warned of possible violence on 6 January before attack
